@title A scheme to manage global constraint for organizations

devdoc.details: The scheme is used to register or remove new global constraints

executeProposal(bytes32,int256).details: execution of proposals, can only be called by the voting machine in which the vote is held.

params._param: a parameter of the voting result, 1 yes and 2 is no.
params._proposalId: the ID of the voting in the voting machine

executeProposal(bytes32,int256).return: bool which represents a successful of the function.

getParametersHash(bytes32,address).details: Hash the parameters and return the hash value

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

proposeGlobalConstraint(address,address,.details: propose to add a new global constraint:

params._avatar: the avatar of the organization that the constraint is proposed for
params._gc: the address of the global constraint that is being proposed
params._params: the parameters for the global constraint
params._voteToRemoveParams: the conditions (on the voting machine) for removing this global constraint

proposeToRemoveGC(address,address,string.details: propose to remove a global constraint:

params._avatar: the avatar of the organization that the constraint is proposed for
params._gc: the address of the global constraint that is being proposed

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setParameters(bytes32,address).details: Hash the parameters, save them if necessary, and return the hash value

params._voteRegisterParams: -  voting parameters for register global constraint

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: A scheme to manage global constraint for organizations

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
